S02mprsvdhu:3_0: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
S02mprsvdhu:4_0: om vipulagarbha vipulavimale vimalagarbhe vimale jayagarbhe vajrajvālāgarbhe gatigahane gaganaviśodhani sarvapāpaviśodhani /
S02mprsvdhu:4_1_0: om guṇavati gaganavicāriṇi-gaganavicāriṇi giri-giri giriṇi-giriṇi gabhari-garddhabhari
S02mprsvdhu:4_1_1: gamari-gamari gabhari-gabhari gaha-gaha gargāri-gargāri gagari-gagari gaṃbhari-gaṃbhari
S02mprsvdhu:4_1_2: gabhi-gabhi gahi-gahi gamani-gamani guha-guha guru-guru [Mpv-Dh_131] guruṇi cale
S02mprsvdhu:4_1_3: mucale samucale guhaṇi-guhaṇi guruṇi-guruṇi culu-culu cale-cale mucale jayavijaye
S02mprsvdhu:4_1_4: jayavati aparājite sarvabhayavigate sarvagarbhasaṃrakṣaṇi siri-siri bhiri-bhiri miri-miri
S02mprsvdhu:4_1_5: giri-giri piri-piri samantākarṣaṇi sarvaśatrūn pramathani rakṣa-rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca
S02mprsvdhu:4_1_6: sarvadā bhayebhyaḥ sarvopadravebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ cili-cili viri-viri dhiri-dhiri
S02mprsvdhu:4_2: muci-muci muri-muri muli-muli kili-kili mili-mili kamale vimale-vimale jayavijayāvahe jayavati viśeṣavati bhagavati ratnamakuṭamālādhari bahuvividhavicitraveśadhāriṇi /
S02mprsvdhu:4_3: bhagavati mahāvidyā devi rakṣa rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca samantātsarvapāpaviśodhani /
S02mprsvdhu:4_4: hulu-hulu mulu-mulu rakṣa-rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvānāñcā(ttvāṃścā)nāthānatrāṇāna(nni)rayanānaśaraṇānaparāyaṇān parimocaya sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ /
S02mprsvdhu:4_6: huru-huru curu-curu turu-turu āyuḥpāla(li)ni suravarapramathani sarvadevagaṇapūjite /
S02mprsvdhu:4_7_0: ciri-ciri viri-viri samantāvalokite prabhe-prabhe suprabhe suprabhaviśuddhe sarvapāpaviśuddhe
S02mprsvdhu:4_7_1: sarvapāpaviśodhani dhuru-dhuru dharaṇidhare dhara-dhara sumuja sumuru-sumuru ru ru
S02mprsvdhu:4_7_2: cale cālaya sarvaduṣṭān pūrayāśān [Mpv-Dh_132] māttaṅgini śrīvapudhare jayakamale
S02mprsvdhu:4_8: om padmaviśuddhe śodhaya-śodhaya śuddhe-śuddhe bhara-bhara bhiri-bhiri bhuru-bhuru maṅgalaviśuddhe /
S02mprsvdhu:4_10_0: om hrīṃṃ traṃ tara-tara tāraya māṃ bhagavati sarvasattvāṃśca nāgavilokite laghu-laghu
S02mprsvdhu:4_10_1: lahu-lahu hulu-hulu hutu-hutu turu-turu tuhu-tuhu kiṇi-kiṇi kṣiṇi-kṣiṇi sarvagrahabhakṣaṇi
S02mprsvdhu:4_10_2: piṃgari-piṃgari mucu-4 sumu-sumu suvicale tara-tara nāgavilokini tāraya māṃ bhagavati
S02mprsvdhu:4_11: sarvatra samantena diśābandhena vajrapāśabandhane vajrajvālini vajrajvālāviśuddhe /
S02mprsvdhu:4_12: bhuri-bhuri bhara-bhara bhiri-bhiri bhuru-bhuru bhagavati garbhaviśuddhe garvasaṃśodhani kukṣisaṃpūraṇi rakṣa-rakṣaṇi /
S02mprsvdhu:4_13: jvala-jvala cara-cara / om jvālini varṣantu(tu) devaḥ samantena divyodakena amṛtavarṣaṇi devatāvatāriṇi /
S02mprsvdhu:4_15_0: rakṣa-rakṣa māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca sarvatra sarvadāsarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopasargebhyaḥ
S02mprsvdhu:4_15_2: kukṣisaṃpūraṇi sarvayakṣarākṣasanāgavidāriṇi bala-bala balavati jaya-jaya vijaya-vijaya
S02mprsvdhu:4_15_3: jayatu sarvatra sarvakālaṃ siddhayantu(tu) me iyaṃ mahāvidyā sādhaya maṇḍalaṃ [Mpv-Dh_133]
S02mprsvdhu:4_15_4: ghāṭaya vidhnān jaya-jaya sidhya-sidhya budhya-budhya pūraya-pūraya pūraṇi-pūraṇi
S02mprsvdhu:4_15_5: pūraya me āśāṃ vidhodgatamūrte jayottari jayakari jayavati tiṣṭha-tiṣṭha bhagavati
S02mprsvdhu:4_16_0: sarvatathāgatahṛdayaviśuddhe vyavalokaya māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca sarvāśāṃ paripūraya
S02mprsvdhu:4_16_1: sarvasattvānāñca trāyasva māmaṣṭamahādāruṇabhayebhyaḥ sara-sara prasara-prasara sarvāvaraṇaviśodhani
S02mprsvdhu:4_16_2: samantākāra - viśuddhe vigate-vigate vigatamale sarvamalaviśodhani sarvamaṅgalaviśuddhe /
S02mprsvdhu:4_28: dhṛtarāṣṭrāya svāhā / viruḍhakāya svāhā / virupākṣāya svāhā / vaiśravaṇāya svāhā / caturmahārājanamaskṛtāya svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_30_0: varuṇāya svāhā / vāruṇāya svāhā / mārutāya svāhā / mahāmārutāya svāhā / agnaye svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_30_1: vāyavye(ve) svāhā / nāgavilokitāya svāhā / devagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / nāgagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_30_2: yakṣagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / rākṣasagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / gandharvagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / apasmāragaṇebhyaḥ
S02mprsvdhu:4_30_3: svāhā / asuragaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / garuḍagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / kinnaragaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / mahoragagaṇebhyaḥ
S02mprsvdhu:4_30_4: svāhā / manuṣyagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / amanuṣyagaṇebhyaḥ svāhā / sarvagrahebhyaḥ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_30_5: sarvanakṣatrebhyaḥ svāhā / sarvabhūtebhyeḥ svāhā / [Mpv-Dh_134] sarvapretebhyaḥ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_31: sarvapiśācebhyaḥ svāhā / sarvāpasmārebhyaḥ svāhā / sarvakubhāṇḍebhyaḥ svāhā / sarvapūtanebhyaḥ svāhā / sarvakaṭhapūtanebhyaḥ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_33: om dhuru-dhuru svāhā / om turu-turu svāhā / om kuru-kuru svāhā / om curu-curu svāhā / om muru-muru svāhā / om hana-hana sarvaśatrūn svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_36: ye mamāhitaiṣiṇasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śarīraṃjvālaya-jvālaya sarvaduṣṭacittānāṃ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_37_0: vajrajvālāya svāhā / samaṃtajvālāya svāhā / maṇibhadrāya svāhā / pūrṇabhadrāya svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_37_1: samantabhadrāya svāhā / mahāsamantabhadrāya svāhā / ākāśamātṝṇāṃ svāhā / samudragāminīnāṃ
S02mprsvdhu:4_37_2: svāhā / rātricarāṇāṃ svāhā / divācarāṇāṃ svāhā / trisandhyācarāṇāṃ svāhā / velācarāṇāṃ
S02mprsvdhu:4_37_3: svāhā / avelācarāṇāṃ svāhā / garbhaharebhyaḥ svāhā / garbhadharebhyaḥ svāhā / garbhahāriṇībhyaḥ
S02mprsvdhu:4_38_0: calu-calu svāhā / hulu-hulu svāhā / om svāhā / bhūḥ svāhā / bhuvaḥ svāhā / svaḥ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_38_1: bhurbhuva ḥ[sva] svāhā / cili-cili svāhā / dharaṇī svāhā / dhāraṇī svāhā / agneḥ
S02mprsvdhu:4_38_2: svāhā / tejovāyū svāhā / cili-cili svāhā / sili-sili svāhā / mili-mili svāhā / budhya-budhya
S02mprsvdhu:4_38_3: svāhā / maṇḍalabandhe svāhā / sīmābandhe svāhā / sarvaśatrūn bhaṃjaya svāhā / jambhaya-jambhaya
S02mprsvdhu:4_38_4: svāhā / stambhaya-stambhaya svāhā / cchinda-cchinda svāhā / bhinda-bhinda svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_38_5: bhaṃjaya-bhaṃjaya svāhā / bandha-bandha svāhā / mohaya-mohaya svāhā / maṇiviśuddhe
S02mprsvdhu:4_38_6: svāhā / sūrye sūryaviśuddhe svāhā / śodhani svāhā / viśodhani svāhā / candre-candre
S02mprsvdhu:4_39_0: grahebhyaḥ svāhā / nakṣatrebhyaḥ svāhā / piśācebhyaḥ svāhā / śivebhyaḥ svāhā / viśvebhyaḥ
S02mprsvdhu:4_39_1: svāhā / śāntibhyaḥ svāhā / puṣṭibhyaḥ svāhā / svastyayanebhyaḥ svāhā / garbhaharebhyaḥ
S02mprsvdhu:4_39_2: svāhā / śivaṃkari svāhā / śāntikari svāhā / puṣṭikari svāhā / balavarddhani svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_39_3: śrīkari svāhā / śrīvarddhani svāhā / balavarddhanakari svāhā / śrījvālini svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_39_4: muci svāhā / namuci svāhā / vegavati svāhā / om svāhā / sarvatathāgatamūrte pravaravigate
S02mprsvdhu:4_39_5: vigatabhayasva me bhagavati sarvapāpasvastirbhavatu mama sarvasattvānāñca svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_40: om muni-muni vimuni-vimuni dhari-dhari cari-cari valane bhagavati bhayaharaṇi-bhayaharaṇi bodhi-bodhi bodhaya-bodhaya budhiri-budhiri cuṃbili-cuṃbili svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:4_42: om muni-muni munivare abhiṣiñca māṃ saparivāraṃ sarvasattvānāñca sarvatathāgatāḥ sarvavidyābhiṣekairmahākavacamudrāmudritaiḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdayādhiṣṭhitaśuddhe mudre vajre svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:6_0: tadyathā om amṛtavare vara-vara pravara viśuddhe hūṃ-hūṃ phaṭ-phaṭ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:6_1: om amṛtavilokini garbha saṃrakṣaṇi ākarṣaṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:7_0: om vimale vipule jayavare jayavāhini amṛtaviraje hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:7_1: om bhara-bhara saṃbhara-saṃbhara indriye balaviśodhani hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭru ru cale svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:7_2: om maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare hūṃ hūṃ phaṭphaṭ svāhā /
S02mprsvdhu:8_2: yayā yukto vajrakāyo namastasyai namo namaḥ //
S02mprsvdhu:8_4: prakṣipte yo viṣanadyāṃ namastasyai namo namaḥ //
S02mprsvdhu:8_10: prāṇāmukto yayai svargaṃ namastasyai namo namaḥ //
S02mprsvdhu:8_20: mārāñjitvā jinā buddhā namastasyai namo namaḥ //
S02mprsvdhu:8_29: smṛtvā kāyagatāṃ kṛtvā namastasyai namo namaḥ //
S02mprsvdhu:8_42: parebhyo diśatāṃ caiva nityaṃ manasi bhāvitām /
S02mprsvdhu:8_50: ḍākinyaḥ śākinīsaṃghā nāgāḥ kāṣordda tu vyādhayaḥ /
S02mprsvdhu:8_56: yaśca tāṃ dhārayet vidyāṃ kaṇṭhe vāhau ca mastake /
S02mprsvdhu:8_60: trisandhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhet nityaṃ buddhārakṣanti taṃ sadā /
S02mprsvdhu:8_79: tamevānye 'pi rakṣanti yasya vidyā kare sthitā /
S02mprsvdhu:8_84: yā strī dhārayed vidyāṃ prasūyedgurviṇī sukham //
S02mprsvdhu:8_88: ityavocad bhagavān sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadabhyanandan // iti //
